articles.title: Exploring the roots of Mercedes’ perplexing Friday pace drop-off in Miami - Formula 1
articles.description: As Max Verstappen romped to victory over Charles Leclerc, Mercedes delivered quite the most puzzling performance of anyone over the Miami Grand Prix weekend. So puzzling, even Mercedes doesn’t understand it.
